com.lrsus.venusdk

Class VENUDiscoveryReceiver

  • com.lrsus.venusdk.VENUMonitor

  • public class VENUDiscoveryReceiver

    Provides background monitoring for locations with the Brand ID.

    Applications should extend this class for their MainApplication, utilizing this to engage users to utilize their brand app.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      VENUDiscoveryReceiver()
      Provides background monitoring for locations with the Brand ID.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Application namespace.
      java.util.UUID brandId()
      Brand ID to filter locations on.

      void didExitRegion(org.altbeacon.beacon.Region region) 
      void onCreate() 
      void venuDiscovered(java.lang.Integer locationId)
      Called when a location is discovered. It does not mean a location is in range, but provides the opportunity for the brand application to perform a background action.

      • venuDiscovered

        public void venuDiscovered(java.lang.Integer locationId)

        Called when a location is discovered. It does not mean a location is in range, but provides the opportunity for the brand application to perform a background action.

        Common use case is to generate a notification to the user.

      • appNamespace

        public java.lang.String appNamespace()

        Application namespace.

      • brandId

        public java.util.UUID brandId()

        Brand ID to filter locations on.
